Articles.Content:
So i was playing around with HyperEdit, and i noticed you can change the orbits of planets and moons, so i had the REALLY bright idea to put all the bodies in KSP (except kerbol) in a low orbit around Jool. Then i waited untill most of the planets were on one side of Jool, and took some pictures which i edited into a panorama, here it is;

Javascript is disabled. View full album

For some reason cant get it to be just a regular pic, probably way to big

Edited August 29, 2015 by Bubbadevlin
